conbody.p: The release notes for Eucalyptus are divided by release number, presented in order from current release to past releases. If you are already using Eualyptus, you can check updates from your older release and compare it with a later release to help determine if you want to upgrade.

section.title: Where to Get More Help
section.p: For help with issues you might experience, or just to ask a question, see the following resources:

ul.li: You can use the Eucalyptus support portal https://engage.eucalyptus.com) or email us directly at support@eucalyptus.com.
The Eucalyptus IRC channel is #eucalyptus on Freenode. This channel is used for real-time communication among users and developers. Information on how to use the network is available from Freenode.

The Eucalyptus community mailing list is community@lists.eucalyptus.com. This list is used for user discussions, problem reports, and other communications. Information on how to subscribe is available at http://lists.eucalyptus.com/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/community

section.title: How to Upgrade
section.p: If you want to upgrade to the current release, you can find upgrade information in the Eucalyptus Installation Guide.
